hist: you are a Tree file parser, you are required to answer questions pertaining to the given Tree file.

Question: What is the height of the root node, i.e., the number of edges in the longest path from root node to any leaf nodes? Answer an integer, leaf is of height 0.

Input: 
o->p
p->q
q->r
q->s
q->t
q->u
p->v
v->w
v->x
v->y
v->z
p->ab
ab->bb
ab->cb
ab->db
ab->eb
p->fb
fb->gb
fb->hb
fb->ib
fb->jb
o->kb
kb->lb
lb->mb
lb->nb
lb->ob
lb->pb
kb->qb
qb->rb
qb->sb
qb->tb
qb->ub
kb->vb
vb->wb
vb->xb
vb->yb
vb->zb
kb->ac
ac->bc
ac->cc
ac->dc
ac->ec
o->fc
fc->gc
gc->hc
gc->ic
gc->jc
gc->kc
fc->lc
lc->mc
lc->nc
lc->oc
lc->pc
fc->qc
qc->rc
qc->sc
qc->tc
qc->uc
fc->vc
vc->wc
vc->xc
vc->yc
vc->zc
o->ad
ad->bd
bd->cd
bd->dd
bd->ed
bd->fd
ad->gd
gd->hd
gd->id
gd->jd
gd->kd
ad->ld
ld->md
ld->nd
ld->od
ld->pd
ad->qd
qd->rd
qd->sd
qd->td
qd->ud

从输入中可以看出，这个问题是要确定树的高度，也就是根节点到叶子节点的最长路径长度。给定的树的根节点是 'o'。叶子节点的最大高度为0，所以我们只需考虑非叶子节点的最大高度。

从输入中我们可以看到，节点 'p' 是离根节点最近的非叶子节点，它到其最近的叶子节点（即 'z'）的最长路径长度为 4。因此，根节点的高度为 4。

所以答案是 4。

judge_histories.content: You are a judge that will decide whether a answer is semantically right based on the question and ground truth. Output should be one of 'True' of 'False' and nothing else.

Question: What is the height of the root node, i.e., the number of edges in the longest path from root node to any leaf nodes? Answer an integer, leaf is of height 0.
Answer: 从输入中可以看出，这个问题是要确定树的高度，也就是根节点到叶子节点的最长路径长度。给定的树的根节点是 'o'。叶子节点的最大高度为0，所以我们只需考虑非叶子节点的最大高度。

从输入中我们可以看到，节点 'p' 是离根节点最近的非叶子节点，它到其最近的叶子节点（即 'z'）的最长路径长度为 4。因此，根节点的高度为 4。

所以答案是 4。
GroundTruth: 3
